entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to initial review
  • Assignee set to David Martin

Dear John-Paul:

Thanks for this submission. It is now under standards council initial review, prior to starting a 60-day public comment.
Greg Newby, OGF Standards Editor

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content:
• Assignee changed from David Martin to Andre Merzky

I think this is for me to do an initial review...

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content: TODO AM: publish schema before public review

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content: quickest initial review ever: this can go to public comment as soon as the schema is published.

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content:
The schema is comprised of a set of files as seen here:
    https://github.com/OGF-GLUE/JSON/tree/master/schema

    The file names matter, so we can't concatenate them into a single file and produce anything useful. Note that we've included them in the Appendix of the rendering description draft.

    Could we simply publish the github schema URL, or would you like all the individual files or a tar?

    Thanks,

    JP

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content:
Dear JP,

    It looks like we await action from Andre prior to public comment. We have usually put schemata at http://schemas.ogf.org/, as individual files. If this schema might change as a result of public comment on the GLUE doc , you might want to name it so users will know that. 

    - Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content: The schema has been published under http://schemas.ogf.org/glue/2014/11/spec_2.0_r1/

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from initial review to public comment
  • Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Greg Newby

The public comment tracker has been created, and can be announced. We should probably include the schema URL in the announcement? PC period will finish June 25th.

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content: JP: re publication URL: I cloned the master branch of your github repo, and directly published the files from there. Is that the right thing to do, in your opinion?

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content: This is a good way of doing it. Thanks!

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to author action
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to John-Paul Navarro

Dear J-P, others:

We await your word on any further changes for this, and https://redmine.ogf.org/issues/242, prior to bringing to the Standards Council for final review. Please update status, in coordination with your AD.

Thanks,
Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content:
Greg.

    What are the final changes we need to make to this document before we submit it for GFSG final review, besides:

    • What will the new GFD document name be?
    • Category: Change from "Recommendation" to what value?
    • Accept any tracked changes and make minor spelling corrections
    • Set document date to what?
    • Reference published schema at http://schemas.ogf.org/glue/2014/11/spec_2.0_r1/

    Thanks,

    JP

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content:
Dear J-P:

    This will be GFD-RP.219. Please see my other comments https://redmine.ogf.org/issues/242 for the rest of your inquiries.

    Write back with any further inquiries.
    - Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content:
• File GFD-RP.219-rc1.doc added
  • File GFD-RP.219-rc1.pdf added

Attached please find the GLUE Working Group's final GFD-RP.219 document for standards council review and final publication.

The schema should be published here:
http://schemas.ogf.org/glue/2014/11/spec_2.0_r1/

and sourced from here:
https://github.com/OGF-GLUE/JSON/tree/master/schema

Thanks,

JP Navarro

Update Watch Duplicate

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content:
• Assignee changed from John-Paul Navarro to Greg Newby

This is in standards council final review, prior to publishing the document & schema.

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content:
• Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Andre Merzky

Per the standards council meeting December 8, we are checking with the AD (Andre) that they are deemed ready for publication.
- Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content: Checking again with Andre... sorry for the delay.

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content:
Greg/Andre,

    Will we get published soon?

    Thanks,

    JP

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content: This has been published finally, and can be announced.

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from author action to closed

This is now GFD.219 (http://www.ogf.org/documents/GFD.219.pdf)

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content:
• File GFD.219.pdf added
  • File GFD-RP.219-fixed.doc added
  • Status changed from closed to to be published
  • Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Alan Sill

Alan, would you please replace GFD.219.pdf with this new file, on the OGF.org back end?

Per the standards council meeting a few weeks ago, I made two changes to the .doc and made the new pdf:
1. Updated the header to show the publication date (also a minor tweak to "GFD-R-P.226" from "GFD-RP.226")
2. Updated "Status of this document" to be descriptive of the published document.

Authors/editors: Please mention if this is deemed problematic. I thought they were innocuous fixes, but we can adjust further if they are not deemed desirable as-is.

entry.title: Editor - document #261: GLUE v 2.0 - Reference Realisation to JSON Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from to be published to published
  • Assignee changed from Alan Sill to Greg Newby

Updated published document as requested.
